author: shu@hexlink.io
description: Utilities and Classes for hexlink contracts
name: @hexlink/common

scripts.build: rimraf lib && rimraf lib.esm && rimraf tsconfig.esm.tsbuildinfo && rimraf tsconfig.tsbuildinfo && tsc --build ./tsconfig.json && tsc --build ./tsconfig.esm.json
scripts.build:watch: rimraf lib && rimraf lib.esm && rimraf tsconfig.esm.tsbuildinfo && rimraf tsconfig.tsbuildinfo && tsc --build ./tsconfig.json && tsc --build ./tsconfig.esm.json --watch
